donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: Provision of support to national and local stakeholders in order to make Roma inclusion strategies and policies implementable and monitorable.

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr:
Any development project should have:
• clearly defined targets, set against a baseline and specifying the milestones that need to be reached during implementation; 
• indicators to monitor project effectiveness (i.e., in terms of attaining outcomes) and efficiency (i.e., the costs of reaching the outcome, reflecting different possible approaches); and
• the ability to monitor possible problems that may arise during implementation. 
Unfortunately, these result-based-management basics are often missing from Roma-inclusion interventions, which are too often based on intuitive assumptions rather than evidence. This output will provide support to individual countries in order to make Roma-inclusion programming more results-oriented.

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: Mainstreaming working approaches at local level through replication and expansion of interventions that worked and are complementary to existing activities addressing vulnerable groups implemented by UNDP, UN agencies or other organizations at local level. Codification of knowledge from the activities.

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: Coordination of the project's country components' implementation through regular visits, interaction with project teams and regional advocacy.

project_descr: Regional support facility for improving the capacity of various stakeholders to make real progress on Roma inclusion
